document.full_text: british singer adele has postponed five dates of her north american tour due to laryngitis, she said on her website, frustrating fans in the united states where she has dominated charts in recent weeks.
document.title: adele cancels north american dates due to laryngitis
lines_and_colors: british singer adele has postponed five dates of her north american tour due to laryngitis, she said on her website, frustrating fans in the united states where she has dominated charts in recent weeks.
